>
[Wand of Wearying Dance](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2298)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Wand" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=164" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 143 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 24,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This colorfully painted wand has a few jingling bells tied to the pommel.

**Activate** <actions string="" /> Cast a Spell;  **Frequency** once per day, plus overcharge;   **Effect** You cast [_uncontrollable dance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=347). When the spell's duration ends, if the target was forced to dance for 1 minute, it becomes [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15).

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of _uncontrollable dance_.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
